N_Zdp_BindingTableEntry_t Struct Reference

#include <N_Zdp.h>

Data Fields

 Binding source address and endpoint. Always a IEEE address.

Detailed Description

Structure containing one binding table entry from a Mgmt_Bind_rsp command.
